publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-504# Colin Fox: Ethicon Workers Oppose Compulsory Redundancies-That the Parliament supports Ethicon workers on their 95% vote to oppose compulsory redundancies. Supported by: Rosie Kane*, Tommy Sheridan*, Carolyn Leckie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-504# Ethicon Workers Oppose Compulsory Redundancies (lodged on 21 October 2003) Frances Curran*
S2M-504# Ethicon Workers Oppose Compulsory Redundancies (lodged on 21 October 2003) John Swinburne*
S2M-504# Ethicon Workers Oppose Compulsory Redundancies (lodged on 21 October 2003) Chris Ballance*
